snippet.title: Haunted Museum (trailer)
snippet.description: Haunted Museum promotional video. This arcade lightgun game by Taito was released in Japan in July 2009. It came to Europe as "Panic Museum" in November 2009. It runs on Type X² system. The deluxe cabinet features a 80" screen.
